email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Trader, available for a laycan of October 15-20. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider $49.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $49.50 is a bit tight. How about we meet in the middle at $50.00 per metric ton? The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Regarding demurrage, could we cap it at $18,000 per day? Also, please confirm the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, glad we could agree on the freight rate. I can confirm the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons. As for demurrage, $18,000 per day is acceptable. I’ll draft the charter party agreement and send it over for your review. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, sounds good. Please include the laycan of October 15-20 and the agreed terms in the charter party. Looking forward to receiving it. Cheers, John.
